title: BRIEF-Guangxi Future Technology in framework agreement on Anhui smart city project
text:
BRIEF-Guangxi Future Technology in framework agreement on Anhui smart city project Sept 1 
Sept 1 Guangxi Future Technology Co Ltd 
* Says signs framework agreement on smart city project in anhui province, total investment 1 billion yuan ($157.16 million) 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1O5neMD 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3630 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
